name: Destroy the toys - Kingdom of colors
name_original: Destroy the toys - Kingdom of colors
description:
this is a simple shooting+tower def. game

this game is part of "Destroy the toys" or DTT series

your enemy is the king of colors who attack your base with his colored army

hint: you can destroy the tank with bullet have the same color only

controls :

Arrow keys for movment

c: red bullet

x: yellow bullet

z: blue bullet
